name: Association Mieux Prescrire
legal: Non-profit continuing education organisation under the French law of 1901
goal:
Association Mieux Prescrire (AMP), is a non-profit continuing education organisation under the French law of 1901, and manages all of Prescrire's publications and programmes. The AMP bylaws contain this statement of purpose: "to work, in all independence, in favour of quality healthcare, first and foremost in the interest of patients (...).".

Nearly all of AMP's members are healthcare professionals, dedicated to providing quality medical and pharmaceutical information. AMP was set up in such a way as to ensure the ongoing independence, quality and usefulness of Prescrire's publications and programmes.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
